Texts.Eng: A task for you: Use a ^orange;Clothing Fabricator^reset; and produce a ^orange;Mutavisk Helm^reset;. I'll pay well for it, as I am in dire need.
Bring the ^orange;Mutavisk Helm^reset; to the scientist at the ^orange;Science Outpost^reset;
Thanks to you, I can finally take a trip to an ^orange;Irradiated^reset; world with my complete ^orange;Mutavisk Armor Set^reset;!
